name: astrogaia
title: AstroGaia
desc: A single-author portfolio theme for Astro.js, mostly oriented to a software developer.
article:
Inspired by the NextJs portfolio-starter-kit template.


This theme supports a markdown/MDX-powered blog, tags, and tag pages, is SEO-friendly, etc.
